title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS INCREDIBLE REACTIONS / PART 2
description:
This is the second part of this non-verbal hypnosis by Dr. Paret. The first video of the series, you can find at: https://youtu.be/zAg7doSDP8o  In the previous video, this man got deeply fascinated and entered in a catalepsy state. Today his trance continues with even deeper hypnotic states, in which he started imitating the facial expressions of the fascinator. In the end of the hypnosis, he shared more about himself and why he started doing the non-verbal hypnosis masterclass by Dr. Paret. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
